_header: O woeful heart make thy complaint
Subjects: Christ, appeal of, to man; dialogues, Christ and man
_description: James Ryman, appeal of Christ to Man and Man’s reply — seven stanzas rhyme royal

CULEe112.First Lines:
O woofull hert make thy complayntWhy art thou bounde with doloure
                    so…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Ayenst his wille that we haue wroughtIn worde in dede in
                    wille & thoughte
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.

             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
